SLogo.FunctionEvaluate

Interface Environment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnvironmentImpl

    public interface Environment
    The environment provides dynamic scoping for the SLogo language, and holds all pre-defined and user-defined functions, methods, and turtles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds a function to the local scope by name

      • getAllFunctions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Invokable> getAllFunctions()
        Returns:

      • filterTurtles

        void filterTurtles(java.util.function.Predicate<Turtle> filter)
        Allows filtering active turtles by predicate.
        Parameters:

      • selectTurtles

        void selectTurtles(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> turtleIDs)
        Allows filtering active turtle by ID. If a turtle with the ID does not exist, it will be created
        Parameters:
        turtleIDs - Ids of turtles to be set active

      • clearTurtles

        double clearTurtles()
        Clears and resets all but 1 turtle
        Returns:
        distance traveled by the 1 turtle that wasn't cleared
